item.description:
Hi everyone,
This time we'll hike from St. Moritz Pond to Sawcut Notch Path, returning on Indian Camp Path green dot trail. This will be a moderate level hike, with some hilly terrain, approximately 4 miles. Meet at Shea Rink in Quincy.

Please bring enough water (very important) and wear sturdy sneakers/hiking boots. Also, consider bringing a snack, sunscreen, bug spray, sunglasses and a hat.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Sunday afternoon hike in the Blue Hills - St. Moritz Pond and Indian Camp Path
